item.description:
Have you tried Korean BBQ? Let's go to Koreana's in Central Square. If that doesn't persuade you. They have sake! I go here often with co-workders and friends. We haven't had anything to complain about yet!

It's close to Central Square's "T" station and they do have parking near by. Check below for parking information.

Parking: 73-75 Prospect street. Public parking is available on Prospect street which is 2 blocks south of Koreana.(less than 3 minutes by walk)
Public parking hours: Mon-Fri after 5pm. Sat, Sun, and Holiday all day.

Hope to see you guys there!
item.name: Korean Food :)
